items.title: New YA Book Releases for July 23, 2025
items.description: Get ready for a campy new graphic novel and a power-girl romantasy, as well as heart-wrenching paperbacks.

items.title: Nice Graphics: 8 Comics About Video Games
items.description: Ready, set, game! Read your way into some excellent comics about video games.

items.title: More of the Best Book Covers of 2025 So Far
items.description: This array of eye candy is a reminder of the power of good book design and how a book cover can truly sell what's inside.

items.title: Memoir and Nonfiction about Non-Marriage
items.description: These books look at non-marriage expansively, from post-divorce life to happy single lives lived on one's own terms.

items.title: Interesting Museum Mysteries & True Crime
items.description: Museums are excellent settings for riveting mysteries and true crime, from real-life heists to detective fiction for kids and adults alike.
